name: Donut Libre
description:
Donut Libre is a wacky 2 player game where you compete to collect donuts. This game was created for Mini Jam 56 with the initial release being completed in 72 hours.

Controls

Player 1

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Throw: Left Mouse Button
  • Aim: Right Mouse Button
  • Pickup Donut: F
  • Ultimate Attack: Q

Player 2 - Must use controller (controls listed for Xbox)

  • Movement: Left Thumb Stick
  • Jump: A
  • Throw: Right Shoulder
  • Aim: Left Shoulder
  • Pickup Donut: B
  • Ultimate Attack: X

Patch Notes
  • Version 1.1
  • Characters no longer able to damage themselves
  • Pushable Donut much easier to move now
  • Winner will be declared when running out of time or filling their Donut Bar
  • Match stats will now be displayed when game is over
  • Movement controls improved
  • Movement animations improved
  • Now able to throw donuts while moving
  • Aim improved
  • Footstep dust applied
  • Spamming input no longer freezes character animations
  • Death no longer resets Donut Bar
  • Ultimate Indicator no longer stays on screen after death
